title: A Safe Girl to Love: Stories
description: Eleven unique short stories that stretch from a rural Canadian Mennonite town to a hipster gay bar in Brooklyn, featuring young trans women stumbling through loss, sex, harassment, and love.These stories, shiny with whiskey and prairie sunsets, rattling subways and neglected cats, show growing up as a trans girl can be charming, funny, frustrating, or sad, but never will it be predictable.Other womenTwenty hot tips to shopping successHow old are you anyway?How to stay friendsLizzy & AnnieReal equality (a manifesto)Portland, OregonNot bleakA carried ocean breezeWinningYouth
author: Casey Plett
